Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset for anyone looking to enhance their experience. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $75 for you. This exclusive offer is tailored to appreciate your interest and support. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that exceeds your expectations at an unbeatable value. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
